title: Update stuck at 33% and then fails
body: I opened up league this morning and it was updating so I was letting it do its thing but then it stayed on 33% for a really long time and then an error came up saying "Update Failed Unspecified error occurred. Please check the logs for more information" Which i tried to do but it crashed. So i restarted my computer and it did it again so I tried to use the repair button but that didnt do anything so I  uninstalled and re downloaded it but it keeps doing it so if you have any idea how to fix it or whats going on please let me know.

replies.body:
Issues during patching at 33% or later are typically caused by the patcher not being able to maintain a strong connection to our patching servers. I suggest working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as your next step in troubleshooting this.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
